name: Into The Darkness (SwitchStatements)
description:
"You heard a sound while you were trying to sleep. It woke you up. Frightened, you decide to go to find what made the sound, but you end up in a place you do not recognize. Are you able to make it out in one piece?"

Made for Mini Jam 77 game jam! My first ever participation in a game jam was really fun, and I learned a lot.

This will be the last update until I decide to work on this project again. This update adds some more interactable items, a couple of models, bug fixes including :

Crystals spawning in the same position, lightbulb's material emission working after the power has been shut off, and being able to set the mouse sensitivity to 0. 

Thank you to those who played this game and enjoyed it.
